metadata.title: CVE-2022-35031 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - negligible.
metadata.description: OTFCC commit 617837b was discovered to contain a segmentation violation via /release-x64/otfccdump+0x703969.

notes.note: ebarretto> From Debian: The otfccdump binary is not build by any source package, hence we are not affected. Yes, we carry the source code of the program, but we don't use it.

criterions.comment: texlive-bin package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
